article: thousands of mourners thronged roads thursday in indonesia to say farewell to late president abdurrahman wahid , a beloved , one-eyed cleric who reached out to religious minorities in the world 's most populous muslim-majority nation .
abstract: indonesians to bury popular former president wahid
